EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending Microsoft Build 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for joining Pivotal at Microsoft Build 2017 and stopping by the booth for a chat about adopting cloud-native application architectures to drive modern, software experiences for your employees and customers. If you’d like to talk to us about arranging a hands-on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-microsoft-build-seattle-q217]]> to begin a discussion.
In the meantime, if you're interested in learning more about how Pivotal Cloud Foundry works with .NET, Java, Azure, and the Microsoft ecosystem we have lots of online resources to help. If you are looking for spare capacity for CI builds, temporary development or test environments, check out Pivotal Web Services <[[http://run.pivotal.io/]]>, a great public cloud for running .NET and Java Spring microservices on Cloud Foundry! Also, don’t forget to check out the free eBooks <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-microsoft-build-seattle-q217]]> we have for you on cloud-native applications, microservices, and much more.
Some links to our offerings for Microsoft developers:
- SteelToe - Netflix OSS services for .NET microservice applications <[[https://steeltoe.io/]]>
- Pivotal Cloud Foundry on Microsoft Azure <[[https://pivotal.io/microsoft?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-microsoft-build-seattle-q217]]>
- Pivotal Cloud Foundry 1.10 support for Windows and .NET <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/welcome-net-native-windows-server-support-in-pcf-1-10?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-microsoft-build-seattle-q217]]>
- Cloud-Native .NET bootcamp in Seattle June 20th 2017 <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/dot-NET-Cloud-Native-Bootcamp-Seattle.html?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-microsoft-build-seattle-q217]]>
And some cool videos and talks about Cloud Foundry on .NET and Azure as well!
- Migrating .NET apps to Cloud Foundry <[[https://www.infoq.com/presentations/bosh-windows-net-core]]> - Running .NET apps on Cloud Foundry <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u88AYbPqSEY]]> - Cloud Foundry on Azure (Short Animation) <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=898lwNYKqrg]]> - Running Cloud Foundry on Azure <[[https://channel9.msdn.com/Shows/Tuesdays-With-Corey/Tuesdays-with-Corey-Cloud-Foundry-is-Generally-Available-on-Azure]]> - Merrill Corporation using Cloud Foundry on Azure <[[https://www.infoq.com/presentations/merill-azure-pcf-microservices/?utm_campaign=infoq_content&utm_source=infoq&utm_medium=feed&utm_term=global/]]>
<[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/building-spring-microservices-with-cloud-foundrys-new-container-networking-stack]]> <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/06/07/notes-on-reactive-programming-part-i-the-reactive-landscape]]> <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/07/28/reactive-programming-with-spring-5-0-m1]]> <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/09/22/new-in-spring-5-functional-web-framework]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/announcing-spring-cloud-data-flow-1-1-cloud-native-architecture-for-enterprise-data]]> <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/now-available-spring-cloud-services-for-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=InfoQ-sponsored-post-newsltr&utm_medium=sponsored-update&utm_campaign=infoq-spring-cloud-services-blog]]> <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/09/12/springone-platform-2016-replay-cloud-native-java]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tx5h3hdvjfw]]>
Stay in touch and join the conversation on our blogs <[[http://content.pivotal.io/blog?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-microsoft-build-seattle-q217]]>, podcasts <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-microsoft-build-seattle-q217]]>, and on twitter <[[https://twitter.com/pivotal]]>.
We hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-microsoft-build-seattle-q217]]>! Thanks, The Pivotal Team
